meaningMnemonic: It's <kanji>solely</kanji> <kanji>one</kanji>. The <vocabulary>only</vocabulary> one. The <vocabulary>sole</vocabulary> one. Totally <vocabulary>unique</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 唯 is the same as the one you learned with the kanji, though there is also a shortened version which has ゆい shortened to ゆ. The reading for 一 is the one you learned with 統一, so you should be able to read it already!
